LocalSoftware.Name: graphlan
LocalSoftware.Description: GraPhlAn is a software tool for producing high-quality circular representations of taxonomic and phylogenetic trees. It focuses on concise, integrative, informative, and publication-ready representations of phylogenetically- and taxonomically-driven investigation.

LocalSoftware.Name: aspera-cli
LocalSoftware.Description: IBM Aspera Command-Line Interface (the Aspera CLI) is a collection of Aspera tools for performing high-speed, secure data transfers from the command line.

LocalSoftware.Name: breakdancer
LocalSoftware.Description: BreakDancer is a Perl/C++ package that provides genome-wide detection of structural variants from next generation paired-end sequencing reads.

LocalSoftware.Name: blast
LocalSoftware.Description: NCBI BLAST+ sequence alignment package. The program compares nucleotide or protein sequences to sequence databases and calculates the statistical significance of matches.

LocalSoftware.Name: stereogene
LocalSoftware.Description: StereoGene: Rapid Estimation of Genomewide Correlation of Continuous or Interval Feature Data

LocalSoftware.Name: bsmap
LocalSoftware.Description: BSMAP is a short reads mapping software for bisulfite sequencing reads.

LocalSoftware.Name: r-genometricorr
LocalSoftware.Description: Genometric Correlation (GenometriCorr) is an R package for spatial correlation of genome-wide interval datasets.

LocalSoftware.Name: agfusion
LocalSoftware.Description: AGFusion is a python package for annotating gene fusions from the human or mouse genomes.

LocalSoftware.Name: freebayes
LocalSoftware.Description: Bayesian haplotype-based polymorphism discovery and genotyping

LocalSoftware.Name: seqyclean
LocalSoftware.Description: Main purpose of this software is to pre-process NGS data in order to prepare for downstream analysis.

LocalSoftware.Name: apkid
LocalSoftware.Description: APKiD is Android Application Identifier for Packers, Protectors, Obfuscators and Oddities - PEiD for Android.

LocalSoftware.Name: r-markdown
LocalSoftware.Description: Markdown is a plain-text formatting syntax that can be converted to XHTML or other formats.

LocalSoftware.Name: salmon
LocalSoftware.Description: Highly-accurate & wicked fast transcript-level quantification from RNA-seq reads using lightweight alignments.
